rows.label: tev022701_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: tev022701_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Lucy about Armory Alley.

rows.label: tev022701_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss

rows.label: tev022701_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Lucy if she's heard any interesting rumors.

rows.label: tev022701_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Lucy if you can pilot a Skell right now.

rows.label: tev022701_SEL0051
rows.name: Ask Lucy about Ganglion weaponry.

rows.label: tev022701_SEL0071
rows.name: Ask Lucy about the special properties of Skells.

rows.label: tev022701_SEL0091
rows.name: Ask Lucy about Ganglion weaponry.

rows.label: tev022701_SEL1021
rows.name: Ask Lucy if she has any interesting news.

rows.label: tev022701_SEL0111
rows.name: Ask Lucy about the Prog Ares.

rows.label: tev022701_SEL3021
rows.name: Ask Lucy about recent developments.

rows.label: tev022701_MSG0001
rows.name:
Have you been to Armory Alley in the
administrative district?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022701_MSG0002
rows.name:
You can buy ground gear from a variety of
manufacturers down there.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022701_MSG0003
rows.name:
Heck, you could even purchase a brand-new Skell from
Sakuraba Industries if you had the credits![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022701_MSG0004
rows.name:
You can also buy equipment that I helped design!
Although I can't tell you what, because it's all covered
under an NDA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022701_MSG0005
rows.name:
I just hope, from the bottom of my heart, that the
products I designed will be of some use to you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022701_MSG0006
rows.name:
If you leave through the west gate and follow the
trail to the northwest, you'll come across the Biahno
Grassland base camp, where BLADEs can take shelter.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022701_MSG0007
rows.name:
If you continue past that and go through the Green
Threshold, you'll find yourself on the thickly forested
continent known as Noctilum.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022701_MSG0008
rows.name:
The terrain within Noctilum is extremely complex,
so I've heard that lots of BLADEs have gotten lost
there.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022701_MSG0009
rows.name: If you have business in Noctilum, please be careful![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022701_MSG0014
rows.name:
New LA's production system isn't able to build Skells as
quickly as we'd like.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022701_MSG0015
rows.name:
So we aren't able to furnish Skells to new BLADE
recruits like yourself.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022701_MSG0016
rows.name:
As a result, we've established a system that restricts
Skell ownership only to those who've earned a Skell
pilot's license.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022701_MSG0017
rows.name:
But I'm confident that with a lot of research and hard
work, one day we'll be able to mass-produce Skells
here on Mira. So please bear with us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022701_MSG0021
rows.name:
I've been briefed about the "Goetia" xenoform that was
encountered in Noctilum.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022701_MSG0022
rows.name:
Apparently she attacked our BLADEs with some sort
of energy weapon.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022701_MSG0023
rows.name:
None of the equipment we've developed is able to
withstand an attack like that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022701_MSG0024
rows.name:
We need to design some new equipment with special
energy-beam-resistant coatings as soon as possible![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022701_MSG0025
rows.name:
We researchers will do all that we can here.
But you can contribute by gathering as many new
schematics as you can find.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022701_MSG0030
rows.name:
Needless to say, a Skell's incredible mobility is its
most potent weapon.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022701_MSG0031
rows.name:
But the destructive power of the weaponry mounted on
Skells should not be underestimated.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022701_MSG0032
rows.name:
For the generators that power Skells also facilitate a
variety of high-firepower weapons systems.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022701_MSG0033
rows.name:
I hear there are some tyrants so tough they can't even
be scratched with conventional weapons.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022701_MSG0034
rows.name:
However, the weaponry available to Skells can punch
right through their armor.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022701_MSG0039
rows.name:
As laboratory researchers, we rarely have the
opportunity to see Ganglion machinery in motion.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022701_MSG0040
rows.name:
During the attack, it was quite exciting to be able to
see the invading Ganglion war machines over our
monitors![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022701_MSG0041
rows.name:
They were so powerful, and so mobile!
With tech like that, it's no wonder they
were able to obliterate Earth so easily.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022701_MSG0042
rows.name:
Now I understand why the developers at Meredith &
Co. were so excited to reverse-engineer their weaponry.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022701_MSG0047
rows.name:
They say the machine Lao stole was still under
development, but it already seems to possess an
impressive amount of power.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022701_MSG0048
rows.name:
All of us engineers at the arms manufacturers would
love to get a look at the tech behind the Ares model
on which it's based.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022701_MSG0049
rows.name:
We've petitioned BLADE HQ to provide us the info,
but so far, no dice.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022701_MSG0050
rows.name: They've turned down every single request.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022701_MSG0051
rows.name:
There must be something about the machine on which
it's based that makes it different from all the other
weapons BLADE possesses.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022701_MSG1001
rows.name:
Someone left a stuffed lobster doll on the road that runs
along the wall outside the Outfitters test hangar.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022701_MSG1002
rows.name:
What were they thinking? Why would someone leave
a stuffed toy in a place like that?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022701_MSG2001
rows.name:
Lyvia is a really sweet person. She always listens so
intently when I'm telling one of my boring stories.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022701_MSG2002
rows.name:
I can't really fall in love with her, since I'm not exactly
wired that way...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022701_MSG2003
rows.name: But if we could become friends, I'd really like that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022701_MSG3001
rows.name:
Apparently a Mediator named Justin was linked to the
Definians, and also giving weapons and funds to a
bunch of criminals.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022701_MSG3002
rows.name:
A lot of strange things have happened since we arrived
on this planet.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022701_MSG3003
rows.name:
It makes me wonder if he was the one directing
some of those situations from behind the scenes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022701_MSG3004
rows.name: But I guess we'll never know the truth now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022701_MSG3005
rows.name:
At least we found him. We owe a big debt of gratitude
to the BLADE who figured it out and stopped him.[ST:wait ]
